tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AdvertisingCampaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
  media_platform VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10,2),
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT
)

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns ( 
    ad_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    campaign_name VARCHAR(255), 
    media_platform VARCHAR(50), 
    ad_cost DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    impressions INT, 
    clicks INT 
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance ( 
    performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    ad_id INT, 
    date DATE, 
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    conversion_rate FLOAT, 
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(ad_id) 
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(50),
    platform VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE impressions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    impression_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE clicks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    click_count INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  campaign_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  media_platform VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  clicks INTEGER,
  conversions INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE media_platforms (
  platform_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_name VARCHAR(50),
  platform_type VARCHAR(50),
  audience_size INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
  impression_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  platform_id UUID,
  impression_date DATE,
  impression_time TIME,
  cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  impressions INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE ad_conversions (
  conversion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id UUID,
  platform_id UUID,
  conversion_date DATE,
  conversion_time TIME,
  revenue DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE advertising_campaigns (
  campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  media_platform VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  platform_id INT,
  impressions INT,
  clicks INT,
  conversions INT,
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES advertising_campaigns(campaign_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES media_platforms(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  performance_id INT,
  click_through_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  conversion_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  time_on_site_sec INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (performance_id) REFERENCES ad_performance(performance_id)
);
